title: Tragedy strikes, but travel refund still tough to get
text: BING NEWS: Tragedy strikes, but travel refund still tough to get Disney Cruise Line’s cancellation policy stipulates that most cruise fares are entirely forfeited for cancellations within 14 days of the sailing date.
